data.lyric:
[ti:Suicidal(feat. Juice WRLD) (Remix|Explicit)]
[ar:YNW Melly/Juice WRLD]
[al:Suicidal (Remix) (feat. Juice WRLD)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Suicidal (Remix|Explicit) - YNW Melly/Juice WRLD
[00:00.88]Suicidal
[00:03.63]Your love is suicidal
[00:06.27]Lately I've been feeling suicidal
[00:10.37]Your love is suicidal
[00:13.05]YNW Melly：
[00:13.51]I thought that we were meant to be
[00:16.79]You took my heart and made it bleed
[00:20.18]I gave you all my ecstasy
[00:23.17]I know you'll be the death of me
[00:27.00]Left lipstick on my Hennessy
[00:30.01]Felt like you took my soul from me
[00:33.88]You gave me all your ecstasy
[00:36.88]I thought that we were meant to be
[00:40.71]YNW Melly/Juice WRLD：
[00:41.21]Your love is suicidal
[00:44.39]For me your love is suicidal
[00:47.78]To me your love is suicidal
[00:50.39]Ooh
[00:51.24]To me your love is suicidal
[00:54.58]Juice WRLD：
[00:54.88]Sippin' on this Hennessy once you were my friend
[00:57.85]Now you turned into my enemy here we go again
[01:01.27]I think love is just like money how it blows in the wind
[01:04.74]Got me taking medicine these is not no vitamins
[01:07.94]I thought that we were meant to be
[01:11.62]'Til you struck out like one two three
[01:15.03]The thought of you was heavenly
[01:18.53]At first now it's where hell will be
[01:22.42]Oh I've been balling on my own shawty sipping fo's
[01:25.71]Pour it in a 20 make a strong shot gripping poles
[01:29.18]Catch 'em the lil' n***a and his old shorty I'ma blow
[01:32.63]Hit him with the Ruger and it's total silent make it go
[01:36.43]Shh
[01:36.91]Getting bonkers make his heart hurt that's what love is
[01:41.97]Leaving me for him are you on drugs b***h
[01:45.23]I know you are 'cause you know perc-less
[01:49.03]You're perfec
[01:49.24]YNW Melly：
[01:49.39]I thought that we were meant to be
[01:52.74]You took my heart and made it bleed
[01:56.17]I gave you all my ecstasy
[01:59.61]I know you'll be the death of me
[02:02.95]Left lipstick on my Hennessy
[02:06.40]Felt like you took my soul from me
[02:09.89]You gave me all your ecstasy
[02:13.29]I thought that we were meant to be
[02:17.35]Your love is suicidal
[02:20.35]For me your love is suicidal
[02:23.63]To me your love is suicidal
[02:26.37]Ooh
[02:27.15]To me your love is suicidal
[02:29.78]I'm sippin' Hennessy-'y-'y ooh
[02:33.20]I'm sippin' Hennessy-'y-'y ooh
[02:37.82]I don't want to lose my conscience
[02:42.96]Drinkin' all this Hennessy
[02:46.40]Baby you took control of me
[02:49.20]And I got too many enemies
[02:52.66]I knew you wanted to f**k him 'cause I could just tell
[02:58.52]Your love is suicidal
[03:01.47]For me your love is suicidal
[03:04.96]To me your love is suicidal
[03:07.50]Ooh
[03:08.46]To me your love is suicidal
[03:12.52]Huh ooh I'm pissin' Hennessy-'y-'y ooh
[03:17.71]Then flush it in the past then fornicate with cash
[03:21.14]I'm tryna heal the gas
[03:22.90]You up and made a slash and left
[03:27.00]Oh you tell your friends
[03:28.42]I was the worst even though it isn't true
[03:31.10]You actin' out your body baby
[03:32.95]I know it isn't you
[03:34.38]See if you feel ridiculed when you play me like a fool
data.trans:
[ti:Suicidal(feat. Juice WRLD) (Remix|Explicit)]
[ar:YNW Melly/Juice WRLD]
[al:Suicidal (Remix) (feat. Juice WRLD)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.88]生不如死
[00:03.63]你的爱让我生不如死
[00:06.27]最近我总是痛不欲生
[00:10.37]你的爱让我生不如死
[00:13.05]//
[00:13.51]我以为我们是命中注定
[00:16.79]你带走了我的心 可你让我遍体鳞伤
[00:20.18]我为你神魂颠倒
[00:23.17]我知道你让我自取灭亡
[00:27.00]酒里残留着你唇齿间的气息
[00:30.01]我觉得你牢牢地握住了我的心
[00:33.88]你曾为我着迷
[00:36.88]我以为我们是命中注定
[00:40.71]//
[00:41.21]你的爱让我生不如死
[00:44.39]于我而言 你的爱让我生不如死
[00:47.78]对我来说 你的爱让我生不如死
[00:50.39]//
[00:51.24]对我来说 你的爱让我生不如死
[00:54.58]//
[00:54.88]喝着轩尼诗 曾经你是我朋友
[00:57.85]如今你变成我的敌人 我们又变成了这样子
[01:01.27]我觉得爱情就像金钱 总是转瞬即逝
[01:04.74]让我沉溺于药物 这可不是维他命
[01:07.94]我以为我们是命中注定
[01:11.62]结果你却离我而去
[01:15.03]当初一想到你 我就觉得很美好
[01:18.53]如今感觉自己身处地狱
[01:22.42]姑娘 我自己一个人也很潇洒 喝着好东西
[01:25.71]来一杯浓烈的饮料 姑娘 真的让人不能自已
[01:29.18]发现那个小老弟 还有他的前女友 我就要发飙
[01:32.63]用鲁格手枪射击他 悄无声息
[01:36.43]//
[01:36.91]变得疯狂无比 让他心痛难当 这就是所谓的爱
[01:41.97]为了他 离开我 你是不是脑子不清醒 碧池
[01:45.23]我知道你不清醒 因为你一直沉迷于那种东西
[01:49.03]简直完美
[01:49.24]//
[01:49.39]我以为我们是命中注定
[01:52.74]你带走了我的心 可你让我遍体鳞伤
[01:56.17]我为你神魂颠倒
[01:59.61]我知道你让我自取灭亡
[02:02.95]酒里残留着你唇齿间的气息
[02:06.40]我觉得你牢牢地握住了我的心
[02:09.89]你曾为我着迷
[02:13.29]我以为我们是命中注定
[02:17.35]你的爱让我生不如死
[02:20.35]于我而言 你的爱让我生不如死
[02:23.63]对我来说 你的爱让我生不如死
[02:26.37]//
[02:27.15]对我来说 你的爱让我生不如死
[02:29.78]我啜饮着轩尼诗红酒
[02:33.20]我啜饮着轩尼诗红酒
[02:37.82]我不想失去理智
[02:42.96]将轩尼诗红酒一饮而尽
[02:46.40]宝贝 你掌控了我的心
[02:49.20]我有许多情敌
[02:52.66]我知道你想和别人缠绵 我心知肚明
[02:58.52]你的爱让我生不如死
[03:01.47]于我而言 你的爱让我生不如死
[03:04.96]对我来说 你的爱让我生不如死
[03:07.50]//
[03:08.46]对我来说 你的爱让我生不如死
[03:12.52]我排出身体里的轩尼诗
[03:17.71]把它随着过去一起冲走 然后一心一意追求钞票
[03:21.14]我要缝合自己心中的伤口
[03:22.90]你给我沉痛一击 扬长而去
[03:27.00]你对你的朋友说
[03:28.42]我是最差劲的人 但事实并非如此
[03:31.10]你在装模作样 宝贝
[03:32.95]我知道那不是你
[03:34.38]明明是我被你玩弄于掌心 你还感觉自己变成了笑柄
